Revise Hover.title: Choose an alignment
Revise Hover.text: Choose an old alignment to fix (hover over them to remind you what you chose and click the one you want to fix).

Revise Clicked.title: Fix alignment
Revise Clicked.text:
Fix alignment, and then click "CONFIRM".
If you regret, you can always click "BACK".

Revise Confirmed Revision.title: Choose alignment or finish
Revise Confirmed Revision.text:
If you need to fix another old alignment, do so now.
Otherwise, hit "EXIT REVISION" to leave the revision mode.

Revise Clicked BACK.title: Choose alignment or finish
Revise Clicked BACK.text:
If you want to try fixing this alignment again or any other old alignment, do so now.
Otherwise, hit "EXIT REVISION" to leave the revision mode.

choose_summary_span.title: Choose Summary Span to Align - Pay attention!
choose_summary_span.text:
Highlight a span of the summary sentence (don't choose all the sentence).
make sure it's:
  1. not too long
  2. covers full events
  3. not too general
